definition[0]: a social meeting of people who have not met for a long time, especially people who were at school or college together
definition[1]: when people are brought together again after a period of being separated

definition[2]: an island in the western Indian Ocean east of Madagascar, that is a dependency of France. Population: 837,868 (2012). Capital: Saint-Denis.
